<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTexture

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Performs a 2D texture lookup within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Performs a lookup operation on the provided texture, with support for multiple texture sources to choose from.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Source**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source)

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_TEXTURE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_TEXTURE** = `0`

Use the texture given as an argument for this function.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_SCREEN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_SCREEN** = `1`

Use the current viewport's texture as the source.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_2D_TEXTURE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_2D_TEXTURE** = `2`

Use the texture from this shader's texture built-in (e.g. a texture of a [Sprite2D](class_sprite2d.md)).<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_2D_NORMAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_2D_NORMAL** = `3`

Use the texture from this shader's normal map built-in.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_DEPTH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_DEPTH** = `4`

Use the depth texture captured during the depth prepass. Only available when the depth prepass is used (i.e. in spatial shaders and in the forward_plus or gl_compatibility renderers).<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_PORT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_PORT** = `5`

Use the texture provided in the input port for this function.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_3D_NORMAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_3D_NORMAL** = `6`

Use the normal buffer captured during the depth prepass. Only available when the normal-roughness buffer is available (i.e. in spatial shaders and in the forward_plus renderer).<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_ROUGHNESS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_ROUGHNESS** = `7`

Use the roughness buffer captured during the depth prepass. Only available when the normal-roughness buffer is available (i.e. in spatial shaders and in the forward_plus renderer).<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **SOURCE_MAX** = `8`

Represents the size of the [Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **TextureType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType)

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_TYPE_DATA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) **TYPE_DATA** = `0`

No hints are added to the uniform declaration.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_TYPE_COLOR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) **TYPE_COLOR** = `1`

Adds ``source_color`` as hint to the uniform declaration for proper sRGB to linear conversion.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_TYPE_NORMAL_MAP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) **TYPE_NORMAL_MAP** = `2`

Adds ``hint_normal`` as hint to the uniform declaration, which internally converts the texture for proper usage as normal map.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_TYPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) **TYPE_MAX** = `3`

Represents the size of the [TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

- [Source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_Source) **get_source**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_property_texture_type"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) **texture_type** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_property_texture_type)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_type**\ (\ value\: [TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType)\ )
- [TextureType](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTexture_TextureType) **get_texture_type**\ (\ )

Specifies the type of the texture if [source](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_property_source) is set to [SOURCE_TEXTURE](class_visualshadernodetexture.md#class_VisualShaderNodeTexture_constant_SOURCE_TEXTURE).
